data.text: Sofaal nii é zeɠezu Naama, naa kpɔɛi zeɠeni, é ɠɛ ma:
«Gooɠaaʋote ge la zɔlɔɔga kpɔɛzuɠula mɔinmɔingi niiti bɛ ɓaa?
Ɗa-ɓɔɛzuɠula wafuungiti ta nuɓusɛiti maaɠɛ kpɔ ɓaa?
È boni ɠite, è ɠɛ ma: ‹Nii gè bosu, gaamai ʋe, ɲàdegɛ è ɠaazu.›
Ee, ni é nɛɛni GALA bɛ, é ɓɔɛ è ʋɔ tɔ ɓɔɠɔi,
A la ná-ɠimalai ma lɔɔɠuzu vai lɛɛna ga ɗe,
«Ɗa zoo nɛi, è GALA ná-faiti kpomaʋɛti kwɛɛ ɓaa?
Gaaɠoozaʋɛ ga geeɠɔlɔgi ɠɛʋele, leeni ɠa ɗa kɛ?
Sakpai ɠoozaʋɛ eteai ʋa,
Ni GALA ga ɠɛna leʋega, é yeeʋɛɛ nu ma, é pili kaso ɠa,
Mazɔlɔɔ GALA ge nu ɲakaiti kwɛɛ,
Kɛlɛ faaɠaaɠalala nui a ɠɛna ɠeleɠelega,
«Ɗɔun ɗa, naa ɠa é ba, è-yii lati GALA ma,
Ni è-yeeiti nɔɠɔʋɛ ga faa ɲɔi, ti ɠaagba,
Ɗa ungi wuzeɠe názu, unfe ge la su,
Ɗa yeema ɗa-ɓɔlɔi ma,
Ɗa-eteai zu ɠa ɠala, é leʋe folo gaalɔgai ʋa,
È-yiimaʋɛ laa ɠa ve ga ladalai, mazɔlɔɔ kitogi ɠa ɠɛ è ʋɛ.
Nu nɔpɛ ge la ʋaa é ʋa ɗa-looɠogi zuɠoloɠolo.
Kɛlɛ nu ɲɔiti gaaɓelagi ɠa ga ti-ɠaazuʋɛ za su,
